proof_script:
lemma finfun_Bex_except_update_code [code]: fixes a :: "'a :: card_UNIV" shows "finfun_Bex_except xs (finfun_update_code f a b) P \<longleftrightarrow> ((a \<notin> set xs \<and> b \<and> P a) \<or> finfun_Bex_except (a # xs) f P)"
by(auto simp add: Let_def finfun_Bex_except_update elim: finite_subset)

by(auto simp add: Let_def finfun_Bex_except_update elim: finite_subset)
